description: Wigan's Luke Robinson scores the only goal of the game against Cambridge, who are now 10 points from safety in League One.
title: Wigan Athletic 1-0 Cambridge United
title_page: Wigan Athletic 1-0 Cambridge United - Robinson seals win for Latics - BBC Sport
maintext:
Wigan Athletic have lost each of their last two league games against Cambridge United and will be looking to avoid losing three in succession for the first time in the EFL.
Cambridge United have won just one of their last seven away league games against Wigan Athletic (D2 L4), a 2-1 victory in April 2022.
Wigan have won just one of their last nine home league games played on a Saturday (D3 L5), conceding 2+ goals in five of those matches.
Cambridge have won just one of their last 11 away league games (D4 L6), though it did come in their last outing on the road with a 2-0 success over Crawley Town.
